data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: This is in furtherance to our letter dated 06th September 2024 wherein the Company had submitted its Annual Report for FY 2023-24. Kindly note that are few inadvertent typo errors were noticed in Annual Report.  In view of the above, we are enclosing herewith the revised Annual Report of the Company for the FY 2023-24 along with the Notice of the 25th AGM. The revised report is also available on the website of the Company at Website: www.radaan.tv.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: The 25th Annual General Meeting (''AGM'') of the Company will be held on Saturday, 28th September 2024 at 04:00 P.M. through Video Conferencing (''VC'')/Other Audio-Visuals Means (''OAVM'') in accordance with the relevant circulars issued by the Ministry of Corporate Affairs (''MCA'') and Securities and Exchange Board of India (''SEBI''). In this regard, please find enclosed herewith the Notice of 25th Annual General Meeting along with the Annual Report for the financial year 2023-2024.

data.caption: Financial Results Under Regulation 33 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 For Quarter Ended 31/12/2021
data.news_body:
We are enclosing herewith, copy of the Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended 31st December 2021, duly approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e. on 12th February 2022.

The company is arranging to publish the extract of the said financial results in newspapers in the format prescribed under Regulation 47 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

The above information will also be made available on the Company's website, www.radaan.tv

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 5.00 p.m. and concluded at 7.50 p.m.

data.caption: Results Update
data.news_body:
Dear Sir,

This is with reference to the unaudited financial results for quarter ended 30/09/2021, submitted on 13/11/2021, Copy of the Limited Review Report was missing in the attachment, so once again filing with complete details.

Kindly take this into your record.

data.caption: Financial Results For Quarter Ended 30/09/2021
data.news_body:
We are enclosing herewith, copy of the Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th September 2021, duly approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e. on 13th November 2021.

The company is arranging to publish the extract of the said financial results in newspapers in the format prescribed under Regulation 47 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

The above information will also be made available on the Company's website, www.radaan.tv

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 5.00 p.m. and concluded at 7.40 p.m.

data.caption: Financial Results For Quarter Ended 30/06/2021
data.news_body:
We are enclosing herewith, copy of the Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June 2021, duly approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e. on 14th August 2021, along with copy of Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company M/s.SRSV & Associates, Chartered Accountants and Statement on Audit Qualification.

The company is arranging to publish the extract of the said financial results in newspapers in the format prescribed under Regulation 47 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

The above information will also be made available on the Company's website, www.radaan.tv

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 12.00 p.m. and concluded at 3.00 p.m.

Please take the aforementioned information on your record.

data.caption: Compliance Under Regulation 23(9) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: In terms of Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith details of related party transactions on a consolidated basis, as required under accounting standards for the half year ended 31st March 2021.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For Financial Year 2020-21
data.news_body:
We are enclosing herewith, copy of the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2021, duly approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e. on 30th June 2021, along with copy of Audit Report issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company M/s.SRSV & Associates, Chartered Accountants and Statement on Audit Qualificaton.

The above information will also be made available on the Company's website, www.radaan.tv

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 5.00 p.m. and concluded at 7.30 p.m.

Please take the aforementioned information on your record.
